translation.en: Is she is okay?
[slurring] She's gonna be okay?
No, no, no. Oh, God.
Our Father, who art in Heaven, hallowed be thy name.
translation.ko: 하늘에 계신 우리 아버지 아버지의 이름을 거룩하게 하시며

translation.en: Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on Earth as--
translation.ko: 아버지의 나라가 오게 하시며 아버지의 뜻이 하늘에서와 같이…

translation.en: While you're at it, ask him why he always takes the kids,
translation.ko: 기도하는 김에 왜 항상 애들을 데려가시는지도 물어봐요

translation.en: while the drunk fucks walk away with scratches.
translation.ko: 술 취한 놈들은 상처 나고 끝인데 말이죠

translation.en: [judge] I find this recommendation very appropriate, Counsel.
And I ask, do you want me to proceed,
translation.ko: 계속 진행하실 겁니까? 아니면 의뢰인이 합의하신답니까?

translation.en: or would your client prefer I set the matter for trial?
I… I accept the sentencing, Your Honor.
[judge] It is the sentence of this court that you be incarcerated for 4-10 years
in the custody of the Illinois Department of Corrections.
translation.ko: 일리노이주 교정 기관에 수감하는 것을 선고합니다

translation.en: The restitution amount that is owed is $140,900.11 to the victim's family.
[Annie] Your room is all ready.
-Who's picking you up? -[sighs]
[Annie] Okay, so get to the dock by 9:00,
otherwise you'll miss the Breeze and you'll have to wait for the Belle.
There's only two ferries these days.
He knows the boat schedule, Annie. [clears throat]
Hmm? No, he was just asking if you knew the boat schedule
translation.ko: 아니, 네가 운항 일정 아는지 아빠가 물어봤어

translation.en: because he just can't wait to see you.
Do you need anything else? Clothes or shoes or anything?
translation.ko: 다른 거 필요한 건 없고? 옷이나 신발?

translation.en: They give it all back to you, right? What you went in with?
translation.ko: 네가 들고 들어간 물건은 다 돌려주지?

translation.en: The clothes and such?
-I'm goin' out. -Out where?
I'm meeting Ooker at the marina.
What, so you're not gonna eat?
Do you wanna say hi to Dad?
Okay. Ed, Riley wants to say hi.
Honey, you know, your dad just stepped out,
and so he didn't hear me, but he says hi.
translation.ko: 내 말을 못 들었는데 네게 안부 전해달래

translation.en: Okay.
Okay. I love you and I will see you tomorrow.
Okay.
Now listen.
Miss Keane says that Ooker's been up to God-knows-what in the Uppards.
translation.ko: 킨 선생님 말로는 우커가 어퍼즈에서 애먼 짓을 한다더구나

translation.en: Miss Keane is crazy, Mom.
Well, I was 16 once and I know what goes on up there, so no Uppards.
translation.ko: 나도 16살일 때가 있었거든 뭐 하는지 아니까 어퍼즈는 안 돼

translation.en: -No trouble, be back by curfew. -I know, Ma.
translation.ko: - 사고 치지 말고 통금 시간 지켜 - 알아요, 엄마

translation.en: And for Jesus' sake, Warren, no drinking.
I promise.
Your brother comes home tomorrow.
That's great, Ma.
Good and truly.
Off you go.
♪ Soo, soolaimon ♪
♪ Lord of my need, need, need ♪
♪ Leading me on, on, on ♪
translation.ko: "성 패트릭 성당 1824년 설립" "프루잇 몬시뇰 복귀 환영 일요일 미사 재개"

translation.en: ♪ On to the woman, she dance for the sun ♪
translation.ko: "프루잇 몬시뇰 복귀 환영 일요일 미사 재개" "오코너와 아들들 수산"

translation.en: ♪ God of my day, day, day ♪
♪ Seek for the way, way, way ♪ ♪ Taking me home and she callin' ♪
-[Ooker] Hey, Flynn. -[Warren] Hey.
Miss Keane says you've been up to no good in the Uppards, apparently.
translation.ko: 킨 선생님께서 네가 어퍼즈에서 나쁜 짓 한다더라

translation.en: Oh. Her lips to God's ears.
No, her lips to my ass.
-You seen him yet? -[chuckling] No, not yet.
Hey, guys!
Oh, shit.
-You didn't invite Aladdin, did you? -Come on. Give him a chance.
translation.ko: - 설마 알라딘도 불렀어? - 그러지 말고 기회를 줘

translation.en: -What's up? -Hey, Ali.
-I'm surprised your dad let you out. -If I wanna go out, I go out.
translation.ko: - 웬일로 네 아빠가 보내줬대? - 내가 나오고 싶으면 나오는 거야

translation.en: [Warren] There he is.
Don't wave the cash around. Jesus.
[scoffs] What?
Uh, he's cool.
-What if he narcs? -[chuckles]
-I wouldn't. -I don't know you.
Come on, Bowl. He can't help who his dad is. We had a deal.
translation.ko: 볼, 얘가 아빠를 바꿀 수는 없잖아 우린 거래를 했어

translation.en: -He wasn't part of that deal. -He's got a point.
translation.ko: - 거래 내용에 얘는 없었어 - 맞는 말이야

translation.en: Fuck my dad. That's what you wanna hear, right?
translation.ko: 우리 아빠는 꺼지라고 해 그 얘기가 듣고 싶었지?

translation.en: Fine, fuck him. Fuck 'em all. Fuck the sheriff.
translation.ko: 좋아, 꺼지라고 해 다 꺼지라고 해, 보안관 꺼져라

translation.en: How about now?
-[Ooker] You're not gonna tell, right? -I said I wouldn't.
'Cause Bowl's the only guy that would get us anything.
translation.ko: 물건 구해 줄 사람이 볼밖에 없단 말이야

translation.en: Is his name actually Bowl?
And if your dad hauls him in or he gets spooked,
translation.ko: 너희 아빠가 걔를 잡아가거나 걔가 쫄기라도 하면

translation.en: that's the last contact we got.
He won't say anything.
-Hey, Leeza. -[chuckles]
-Up to no good I can tell. -Just goin' for a ride.
translation.ko: - 딱 봐도 수상하네 - 바람 좀 쐬려고

translation.en: -A short trip courtesy of Bowl. -Yo. For real?
translation.ko: - 볼 덕분에 잠깐 뿅 갈 거야 - 야, 진심?

translation.en: You're worried I'd narc?
I wish you could come with us.
I'm good. I actually prefer not to smell like cat shit.
translation.ko: 됐어 고양이 똥 냄새 풍기기 싫거든

translation.en: Time for supper, Leeza.
Hey, Ms. Scarborough.
Hey there, Warren.
Come along, dear.
-[Warren] Did you bring a life jacket? -[Ali] What?
-[Warren] A life jacket. -[Ali] No. Are you serious?
[Ooker] Hey, if we flip, don't get your foot under the seat. You'll drown.
translation.ko: 배가 뒤집히면 의자 밑에 발 넣지 마, 익사하니까

translation.en: It's an awful way to go.
This is a thing we've been doin' for generations, man,
so you fuck this up and tell your dad…
translation.ko: 네가 깽판 치고 네 아빠한테 말하면

translation.en: -It's gonna be bad for you, man. -[Ali] I'm not gonna tell my dad. Come on.
translation.ko: - 가만 안 둬 - 아빠한테 말 안 한다고

translation.en: [Ooker sighs] I patched it, so no more leaks. I think.
translation.ko: 구멍 때웠으니까 아마 더는 물 안 찰 거야

translation.en: -[Warren] You got a flashlight? -[Ali] Oh, yeah. I got that.
-You guys see that? -[Ali] What?
Like a heron, or a monster pelican. It flew right over us.
translation.ko: 왜가리인지 거대한 펠리컨이 우리 머리 위로 날았어

translation.en: It was huge. I saw the wingspan.
[Warren] Somebody's gotta do something about these strays.
translation.ko: 누군가 이 길고양이들을 어떻게든 해야 하는데

translation.en: It didn't used to be this bad, but it's an army now.
translation.ko: 이렇게까지 심하진 않았는데 이제 한 부대가 됐어

translation.en: My dad says they're all from the mainland?
translation.ko: 아빠가 그러는데 다 육지에서 온 거라며?

translation.en: [Warren] Yeah. Technically, they have to be.
I mean, I don't know when people brought cats up here,
translation.ko: 사람들이 언제 고양이를 이리로 데려왔는지는 몰라도

translation.en: but they definitely brought more than one.
translation.ko: 한 마리만 데려온 건 확실히 아니야

translation.en: [Ali] I can't believe there's enough for them to eat.
[Ooker] Well, we know what they're eating.
When people actually lived up here, they'd bury their dead in their yards,
translation.ko: 여기에 사람들이 살았을 때 마당에 시신을 묻었대

translation.en: up until the '20s, my dad says.
You know, sometimes there's a storm,
and it floods and those bodies just pop up right out the ground. Cat food.
translation.ko: 홍수가 나면 시신이 땅에서 튀어나와서 고양이 밥이 되지

translation.en: You know, those bodies are hundreds of years old and just bones.
translation.ko: 수백 년 된 시신이니까 뼈만 남았거든

translation.en: And when it storms, they wash up on the west bank by my house.
translation.ko: 폭풍이 오면 우리 집 근처 둑까지 밀려와

translation.en: And I know, because everything from the Uppards
translation.ko: 어퍼즈의 모든 건 서쪽 둑에 밀려와 쌓이고

translation.en: washes up on the west bank, and I gotta clean it up, moron.
-[Ali] What is this? -[Ooker] Take it.
Uh, no, thanks.
-You don't drink? -Not that one.
translation.ko: - 술 안 마셔? - 그건 안 마셔

translation.en: Usually, we just come up here, smoke a joint.
translation.ko: 보통 우린 여기 와서 떨 피우거든

translation.en: He starts pining after roller girl.
Hey, no disrespect. It sucks being stuck in that chair.
translation.ko: 야, 나쁜 의미는 아니야 휠체어 신세라니 안타까워

translation.en: [Ali] Hello, kitties.
You know, my brother Bobby, and Warren's brother too,
used to tell us that the Uppards was haunted.
-Ghost of a dead fisherman. -Yeah, Harpoon Harry.
translation.ko: - 죽은 어부의 유령 - 맞아, 작살 든 해리

translation.en: -Harpoon Harry. -[Warren chuckles]
Yeah, he harpooned kids for their meat.
It's all bullshit though,
so we wouldn't follow them when they came here to drink.
translation.ko: 자기들 술 마실 때 쫓아올까 봐 한 얘기지

translation.en: I mean, we didn't.
I did. Once.
I followed Bobby up here before he went to college.
translation.ko: 보비가 대학 가기 전에 한 번 따라왔었어

translation.en: The only scary thing I saw was him fucking Heather Delman.
translation.ko: 그때 본 무서운 광경이라고는 형이 헤더 델먼을 쑤시는 거였지

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yup.
Shit, they're fighting. Nope.
They're fucking.
Bobby sounded just like that.
-[twig snaps] -Shit!
Warren? What the fuck?
I thought I saw something.
I guess it was Harpoon Harry, cometh at last! Ah!
translation.ko: 작살 든 해리가 드디어 등장하셨나 봐!

translation.en: [Ali chuckles] Yo, stop.
[Ooker] Oh, man. I laid in cat shit.
[Annie] Thank God. Thank God. Thank God.
Oh, my boy. Home, where you belong.
translation.ko: 우리 아들, 집에 왔네 네가 있어야 할 곳이지

translation.en: Oh. Let's get you fed. You gotta eat.
Uh, just you? Where's Dad? And Warren?
Well, you know, they're on the boat.
He just can't miss a shift. Not a single one.
translation.ko: 아빠는 교대를 못 빼먹거든 한 번이라도

translation.en: We can't afford it. But let's get you home. [sighs]
translation.ko: 그럴 형편이 아니야 어쨌든 집에 가자

translation.en: -[Bev] Excuse me, Sturge. -Mornin', Miss Keane.
Monsignor Pruitt was supposed to be on board. Did you see him?
Nope. Uh, maybe he's gonna catch the Belle later on this afternoon.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 이따 오후에 벨호를 타려나 봐요

translation.en: [Bev] No, he said the Breeze.
We agreed before he left. You didn't see him?
He's not easy to miss, Sturge.
Yeah, well, you're right.
Maybe I just, uh, lost him in the crowd.
[Sarah] Okay, here we go.
Hi there.
And that's the--
The spine, and it's perfect.
And that's the little foot, and it's kicking a little bit.
translation.ko: 여기 작은 발이 있는데 발을 차고 있어요

translation.en: Let me measure your foot.
Okay, baby.
Hi, Littlefoot.
Everything is exactly where I want it to be at 20 weeks.
-Have you had any spotting recently? -No.
Why?
-There's a little bleed in there. -Oh, God.
I'm not worried about it. It's very small. We'll keep an eye on it.
translation.ko: 걱정은 안 돼요 아주 소량이니 지켜봅시다

translation.en: [sighs] I guess he's home.
Poor woman.
Peggy? Is that you, Peg?
-Oh, my God, Ma. What are you doing? -Peggy.
No, Ma. That's Erin. Peggy's daughter, Erin Greene.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 엄마, 에린이에요 페기의 딸 에린 그린요

translation.en: -Do you remember Erin Greene? -Hi, Mrs. Gunning.
translation.ko: - 에린 그린 기억하죠? - 안녕하세요, 거닝 할머니

translation.en: I think you've put me in the wrong room.
translation.ko: 날 엉뚱한 방에 보낸 것 같아

translation.en: My room is upstairs.
[Sarah] No, Ma. No more stairs. Not for a year now.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 인제 계단은 적어도 1년 동안 금지예요

translation.en: Not since you broke your hip.
[Hassan] Hey. Good boy.
-[Annie] Morning, Sheriff. -Hey. Morning, Annie.
I'll be in a little later this morning. I switched my shift.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침엔 좀 늦을 거예요 근무 시간 바꿨거든요

translation.en: [Hassan] Oh. Take your time. Yeah, this must be your son. Riley, is it?
-Rise and shine, Joe. -Oh, shit.
-[coughing] -You want some coffee?
-What did you do to me, Sharif? -Sheriff.
translation.ko: - 뭔 짓을 한 거야, 샤리프? - 샤리프가 아니라 보안관요

translation.en: I'm surprised you're surprised. I figured this is where you wanted to be.
translation.ko: 놀랐다니 놀랍네요 여기 오고 싶어 하는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: You were trying to break in, after all.
Well, into the general store anyway.
Half past midnight and sweating pure Jim Beam.
translation.ko: 자정을 30분 넘긴 시각이었고 모공에선 짐 빔이 흘렀죠

translation.en: Havin' at the windows with an oar.
We'd still be sweepin' up glass if your aim had been any good.
translation.ko: 제대로 강타했다면 아직도 유리를 쓸고 있었을 거예요

translation.en: So you lock me up?
Well, Joe, I learned early there's no point trying to stop you drinking.
translation.ko: 조, 술을 못 마시게 말리는 건 소용없을 줄 진작 알았어요

translation.en: Yeah, easy for you to say. Allah doesn't let you drink.
translation.ko: 말이야 쉽지 그쪽은 금주를 해야만 하니까

translation.en: You said you were being followed by a giant albatross.
translation.ko: 당신이 거대한 앨버트로스한테 쫓기고 있다고 했어요

translation.en: -Huh? -Oh, yeah. [imitates Joe] "Wings as big as lawn chairs," you said.
translation.ko: 네, '야외 의자 만큼이나 큰 날개를 가졌어'라고 했죠

translation.en: Well… that makes a little sense, actually, because albatross is bad luck.
translation.ko: 말은 좀 되네 앨버트로스는 재수 없는 징조니까

translation.en: You'd know that if you was a fisherman.
Easy, big fella. Easy. Hello.
Snapped at me. Snapped right at me, just passing by.
Pike didn't snap.
Barks sometimes. Mostly just to say hello.
He's just big is all. He just sounds bigger than he means to.
translation.ko: 몸집이 클 뿐이야 의도보다 소리가 클 뿐이지

translation.en: Snapped. Thought he might have a go at my hand if I reached out.
translation.ko: 입질했어요, 내가 손이라도 내밀었다면 물 기세였죠

translation.en: I'm telling you, Sheriff, it's a menace.
I'm sorry, Miss Keane. He's just waiting for his dad.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 킨 선생님 아빠를 기다리던 것뿐이에요

translation.en: Speaking of a menace.
Hey, what's that, Beverly? You wanna speak up?
Yeah, you just ignore her, buddy. She's just mean. She's just a meanie.
translation.ko: 그래, 쟤는 무시해, 친구 그냥 못된 애야

translation.en: I'm sorry for the hassle. I mean it.
Can't be what you pictured when you took this job,
translation.ko: 이 일을 수락했을 때 이럴 거라고 상상도 못 했겠지

translation.en: dealing with me all the time.
Ah, it might bother me if I gave you much thought.
[clicks tongue] Come on, buddy.
Later, Sharif.
Take care, Joe.
See you soon.
Yeah, the Millers went last year.
They didn't even list.
I don't think anyone's trying to sell anymore. They just left.
translation.ko: 이젠 아무도 팔려고 안 해 그냥 떠나버리지

translation.en: Frank's got a job in Oregon now.
Factory job.
Oh. Welcome home, honey. Welcome home.
You comin'?
Sorry. Your dad's been using this to store some stuff in.
translation.ko: 미안, 네 아빠가 여기 물건을 보관했었어

translation.en: Don't have room for it anywhere else. Sorry.
translation.ko: 다른 데는 둘 공간이 없거든 미안하다

translation.en: -He really didn't show up. -Don't look at it like that.
translation.ko: - 아빠 진짜 안 왔네요 - 그런 식으로 생각하지 마

translation.en: You're home now. He's treatin' you normal. That's all.
translation.ko: 이제 네가 집에 왔으니까 평소처럼 대하는 거야

translation.en: You don't know what it's like these days.
You can only fish certain spots, certain days, crab certain spots,
translation.ko: 낚시할 수 있는 장소, 날짜도 정해져 있어

translation.en: since the spill.
Three years since the spill, yeah, which was bad enough.
God only knows. I mean, you couldn't eat anything out of that water.
translation.ko: 바다에서 나는 건 아무것도 먹을 수 없었고

translation.en: Your father smelled like diesel every day he came home,
translation.ko: 네 아빠는 집에 올 때마다 디젤 냄새를 풍겼지

translation.en: even after they said it was all cleaned up.
I mean, I thought the environmentalists were on our side.
translation.ko: 환경 운동가들이 우리 편인 줄 알았는데

translation.en: These limits, these retention limits, going on about population decline,
translation.ko: 개체 수 감소 때문에 어획량을 제한한다더니

translation.en: and suddenly, there's a limit.
But not for the oil company, for us. For the boats.
translation.ko: 석유 회사가 아니라 우리한테 우리 어선에

translation.en: We can only catch as much as they say?
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 정해주는 만큼만 잡을 수 있다고?

translation.en: But they've never been watermen. Never worked these waters.
translation.ko: 뱃일도 안 해봤고 이 바다에서 작업해 본 적 없는데

translation.en: I mean, you want to talk population decline,
translation.ko: 개체 수 감소 얘기를 할 거면

translation.en: let's talk about the people.
The people on this island, we used to be hundreds.
Now we're just dozens.
This isn't a community anymore, honey.
It's a ghost.
-He'd be here if he could. -Sure, Mom.
translation.ko: - 아빠도 올 수 있으면 올 거야 - 그러시겠죠

translation.en: I figured this is the first time Sheriff Hassan
has been with us for a storm like this,
translation.ko: 이런 폭풍을 겪는 건 처음일 테니까

translation.en: and I thought we could all use a refresher.
translation.ko: 이 기회에 우리도 환기하는 게 좋을 것 같았어요

translation.en: Thank you, Mayor.
Um, still looking like it'll hit us right in the face.
translation.ko: 폭풍은 여전히 우리를 정면으로 강타할 것 같아요

translation.en: Weather services are calling it a major storm,
forecasting to have the worst of it landing tomorrow night.
translation.ko: 내일 밤이 가장 심각할 것으로 보고 있습니다

translation.en: Assuming it does hit and hits like they say,
the biggest thing I wanted to talk about was our fuel supply.
Sturge?
Yeah, I'll make sure the pumps are off, as usual.
Uh, just before sundown so that the, uh, watermen can fuel up after the catch.
translation.ko: 뱃사람들이 돌아와서 연료를 채울 수 있게 일몰 직전에요

translation.en: And I'm assuming you'll cut the power to the marina?
-Oh, we'll likely lose power anyways. -Oh, yeah.
Then I'm thinking we make the classrooms available here for shelters if we need.
translation.ko: 필요시엔 이 교실들을 대피소로 쓰고 항상…

translation.en: -We could always-- -I'm sorry. [chuckles]
You're new, so you wouldn't be expected to know this,
but St. Patrick's is always the shelter.
We set out cots as a matter of rule, always have.
translation.ko: 침구를 거기 마련하는 게 관행이죠 항상 그랬어요

translation.en: Now… Well, now, we have the new rec center.
It's not completely done, but close, and it holds twice as many.
translation.ko: 완공되진 않았지만 두 배는 많은 사람을 수용할 수 있어요

translation.en: I mean, I'm not sure holding twice as many makes a material difference.
translation.ko: 수용 인원이 두 배라고 실질적 차이가 있을지 모르겠어요

translation.en: When you do the math, you…
-Apologies, Miss Keane. I wasn't aware. -[Bev] No need to apologize.
translation.ko: - 미안해요, 킨 선생님, 몰랐어요 - 사과할 필요 없어요

translation.en: You'd have no reason to know that.
All right, um--
Bear it in mind for yourself as well,
unless you plan on hopping a ferry to the mosque,
translation.ko: 페리에 올라타고 모스크에 갈 게 아니라면

translation.en: you'll have to hunker down with us too.
And you'd be so welcome, of course.
[smacks lips] Thank you.
Uh, we'll let everybody know to head to St. Patrick's if things get bad.
translation.ko: 상황이 안 좋아지면 모두에게 성당으로 가라고 하죠

translation.en: [chuckling] They know that.
Understood. Uh, now, let's talk boats. Securing the marina for starters.
translation.ko: 알았습니다, 이제 배 얘기를 하죠 일단 정박지에 잘 묶어 두고요

translation.en: How often do you have to go to the mainland?
Once a week.
Warren, eat your food.
Uh, it's fine. It's, um… AA meetings.
Part of the deal. Condition of my parole. [Annie] Warren.
How was your day? How was school?
It was good. Miss Greene was mostly on about the storm.
translation.ko: 괜찮았어요, 그린 선생님은 주로 폭풍 얘기만 했죠

translation.en: Miss Greene? That old bird's still teaching?
translation.ko: 그린 선생님? 그 할머니가 아직도 가르쳐요?

translation.en: Nah, the old Miss Greene died in the spring.
This is the new Miss Greene, her daughter.
-Erin's back? -[Annie] Mmm-hmm.
I meant to tell you about that. She's only been back a few months.
translation.ko: 네게 얘기해 주려 했어 아직 돌아온 지 몇 달 안 됐지

translation.en: She moved into Peggy's house. Her old job too.
translation.ko: 페기의 집으로 들어갔어 전 직장에도 복귀하고

translation.en: I don't know how long she's staying,
but it was so nice to have someone move to the island.
translation.ko: 섬으로 이사 오는 사람이 있다니 좋더구나

translation.en: -And a young person at that. -[Riley] Um…
Where is she back from? What was she doing?
Mmm, I suppose you'd have to ask her.
We know one thing she was doing.
-Warren. -What? She told us herself.
Besides, she's starting to show,
so if it was a secret, it's not going to be for long.
[Annie] Whatever happened when she ran away,
translation.ko: 걔가 도망갈 때 무슨 일이 있었든

translation.en: she has grown into a fine young woman and a fine teacher,
and we're lucky that she's back.
Prodigal daughter. You'll see her tomorrow, in fact.
translation.ko: 돌아온 탕아야 그러고 보니 내일 만나겠네

translation.en: She sits in the starboard side, halfway back, just like her mother, every week.
translation.ko: 우측 중간쯤에 앉아 자기 엄마가 매주 그랬듯이

translation.en: -Tomorrow? -[Annie] At church.
I wasn't… planning on going to church.
[Annie chuckling] Don't be silly. Of course you are.
translation.ko: 바보 같은 소리 하지 마 당연히 가야지

translation.en: No, things have changed for me, Ma. I'm not… That's not me anymore.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 많은 게 변했어요, 엄마 전 옛날과 달라요

translation.en: Well, see, Monsignor Pruitt said, before he went on pilgrimage. He said--
translation.ko: 프루잇 몬시뇰께서 성지 순례를 떠나기 전에 말씀하시길…

translation.en: Isn't he a little bit old to be traveling? He's gonna be 80 now.
translation.ko: 여행하기엔 늙지 않았어요? 이제 여든이실 텐데

translation.en: Mmm, well, the whole congregation pitched in.
-Two weeks in the Holy Land. -Jesus.
He spent his whole life on the island,
and the chance to walk in Jesus' footsteps, in his actual footsteps.
translation.ko: 말 그대로 예수님의 발자취를 따를 기회잖아

translation.en: -[Riley] Yeah. -We thought he deserved that before--
translation.ko: - 네 - 더 늦기 전에 가시는 게…

translation.en: I'm surprised they let him go, though, considering his health.
translation.ko: 그분 건강을 생각하면 보내드린 게 신기해요

translation.en: You should be so lucky to be as fit as him at his age.
translation.ko: 너도 그분 나이에 그 정도 정정하면 다행인 거야

translation.en: He's losing it.
He held up the host three times during Consecration the other day.
translation.ko: 한번은 축성할 때 성체를 세 번이나 드셨어

translation.en: -I felt ridiculous ringing the bell. -[Annie] We all have our moments.
translation.ko: - 종을 울리면서도 기가 막히더라 - 사람이 실수할 때도 있지

translation.en: [Warren] People have been seeing him wandering around at night,
translation.ko: 사람들이 그분이 밤에 돌아다니는 걸 봤대

translation.en: like late at night.
Like, midnight. At the marina, the docks, the general store.
Did you see him, Warren? Do you know it was him?
No, I'm sure it was some other 80-year-old man
wearing a fedora and the long coat he always wears.
translation.ko: 중절모 쓰고 롱 코트 입고 다녔겠죠

translation.en: [Annie] Even if he was getting a little bit scattered,
he belongs here on the island with us.
translation.ko: 우리와 함께 이 섬에 있는 분이야

translation.en: Not in some home, put out to pasture by the archdiocese.
translation.ko: 대교구에서 어디 양로원에 보낸 게 아니라고

translation.en: Who knows who they'd send in his place?
translation.ko: 그분의 대체자로 어떤 사람을 보낼지 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: So if we do cover for him, just a little--
We're practically steering him around the altar half the time.
That is not true.
[chuckles] Come on. You can't fool the altar boys.
-You a thurifer? -That's right.
I never had any ambitions past acolyte myself.
No one likes a downwardly mobile altar boy.
translation.ko: 신분이 하락한 복사는 아무도 안 좋아해

translation.en: I was really only in it for the chicks. -[chuckles] -You know, man in uniform.
translation.ko: 순전히 여자들 때문에 한 일이었지 제복 입은 남자, 알지?

translation.en: It's not funny.
It's not funny at all.
You're gonna sit here at this table, after what you…
After what you've done,
and say, "Oh, church isn't for me"?
And make jokes about altar boys and Monsignor Pruitt?
translation.ko: 그러고는 복사와 프루잇 몬시뇰에 관해 농담해?

translation.en: Mmm-mmm. No. Nope.
You are going to church tomorrow, Riley.
-Dad-- -And every other Sunday.
I don't care if your heart's not in it or the mood doesn't strike you.
translation.ko: 관심이 없든 갈 기분이 아니든 상관없어

translation.en: You can consider it a condition of your parole.
Monsignor!
Monsignor!
Monsignor, you are home. Welcome back.
I'm so relieved you're okay. I waited for you this morning.
You weren't on the Breeze like we agreed.
I'm sure you just forgot, had one of your…
Still, you have no idea how it makes me look,
standing there on the dock like some jilted prom date.
translation.ko: 졸업 파티 상대에게 바람맞은 여자처럼 부두에 서 있었죠

translation.en: And, oh, you won't believe that new sheriff.
Omar Sharif, or whatever.
He's trying to set the school as the new storm shelter. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 학교를 폭풍 대피소로 하려 한 거 있죠

translation.en: Y'all settled?
Yeah. I'm good.
She's been goin' to St. Patrick's every day since the accident.
translation.ko: 사고 후 네 엄마는 성 패트릭 성당에 매일 갔어

translation.en: Even if there weren't a mass, she'd go, say a rosary for you.
translation.ko: 미사가 없어도 너를 위해 묵주 기도를 드렸지

translation.en: -[clears throat] Every day. -I'll…
I'll apologize to her, Dad.
Mom caught me up.
I'm sorry things have been so hard since the spill.
So church isn't for you, huh?
No, it's not for me.
You should sit back then, during Communion. That's proper.
translation.ko: 영성체 때 앉아 있어 그게 맞아

translation.en: Assuming you haven't been to confession, and I'm assuming you haven't.
translation.ko: 고해를 안 했으면 말이야 아마 안 했겠지

translation.en: That'll upset your mother,
you not taking the sacrament, but…
wouldn't be respectful if you did.
Okay.
Okay.
Good night.
[clears throat] Okay.
-No phone. -Okay, okay.
I don't wanna hear you texting.
I can hear you texting.
The sheriff can hear everything.
All right, Dad.
Kiss your mother.
-Good night, young man. -Night, old man.
[Hassan] Just ten minutes, then the phone goes off!
Don't be scared, Mom. It's just me.
My room.
-Take a step. One step down. -[groans]
[Ed sighs] Red sky at night, sailor's delight.
Red sky in the morning…
-Sailor take warning. -That's right.
It took us less than an hour with the boat.
I bet the storm's not as bad as they say. It feels like they never really are.
translation.ko: 폭풍이 말처럼 심하진 않을걸 그랬던 적이 없는 것 같아

translation.en: My dad didn't board the windows,
translation.ko: 우리 아빠도 창문에 판을 안 댔어

translation.en: and he basically invented overreacting, so that should tell you something.
translation.ko: 오두방정의 창시자가 그러시니 말 다 했지

translation.en: -You wanna fill the cruets? -Yeah.
Somebody already did.
-[Bev] Morning, everyone. -[crowd mumbles]
Today is the seventh Sunday of Ordinary Time.
Our opening hymn is "Faith of Our Fathers,"
number 787 in your red hymnal.
Who's that?
Good morning.
I know I'm not who you expected to see this morning.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침에 만나길 바란 분이 제가 아니란 걸 알아요

translation.en: I'm Father Paul Hill,
and I was sent by the diocese to fill in for Monsignor Pruitt for a few weeks.
translation.ko: 몇 주 동안 프루잇 몬시뇰을 대신하라고 교구에서 보냈죠

translation.en: He fell ill, I'm afraid, on his trip. -He's fine. -[crowd murmuring]
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 몬시뇰께선 여정 중 병에 들었지만 괜찮으십니다

translation.en: [Father Paul] He's recovering in a hospital on the mainland.
He's better off off-island,
and, well, his condition was noticed by some others on his trips, so…
translation.ko: 함께 순롓길을 걷던 사람들이 그분의 상태를 알아챘어요

translation.en: The diocese has asked me to step in until he is up and about again,
translation.ko: 그분이 쾌차하시기 전까지 제가 나서길 교구에서 요청했죠

translation.en: but I assure you there is absolutely nothing to worry about.
You are not losing your pastor. I can promise you that.
translation.ko: 여러분의 사제를 잃는 일은 없다고 약속하죠

translation.en: This is a temporary situation,
and it is my absolute pleasure to be here with you all at St. Patrick's.
translation.ko: 성 패트릭 성당에서 여러분과 함께하게 돼서 기뻐요

translation.en: Just know, I'm only here to help, and I look forward to meeting you all.
translation.ko: 전 도와주러 온 것뿐이고 어서 여러분을 만나 뵙고 싶습니다

translation.en: [all] In the name of the Father, and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit.
"The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God,
and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit, be with you all…"
"He took bread and gave you thanks."
"He broke the bread, gave it to his disciples and said,
'Take this, all of you, and eat it.'"
"'This is my body, which will be given up for you.'"
translation.ko: '이것은 너희를 위해 내주는 내 몸이다' 하시고

translation.en: "When supper was ended, he took the cup."
"Again, he gave you thanks and praise, gave the cup to his disciples and said,
'Take this, all of you, and drink from it.'"
"'This is my blood, the blood of the new and everlasting covenant.'"
translation.ko: '이것은 나의 피다 새롭고 영원한 계약의 피다'

translation.en: "'It will be shed for you and for all so that sins may be forgiven.'"
translation.ko: '너희의 죄를 사하기 위해 내가 흘리는 피다'

translation.en: "'Do this in remembrance of me.'"
translation.ko: '마실 때마다 나를 기억하여 이 예를 행하라'

translation.en: -Body of Christ. -[Dolly] Amen.
-Body of Christ. -[Wade] Amen.
Blood of Christ.
Body of Christ. Body of Christ.
[Bev] Blood of Christ.
-[Father Paul] Body of Christ. -Riley.
I'll sit down here.
-[Father Paul] Body of Christ. -[Ed clears throat]
[Father Paul] Body of Christ. Body of Christ.
[Bev] Blood of Christ, Erin Greene.
[Father Paul] Body of Christ.
[Bev] Blood of Christ.
Well, I met him last night, of course, at the rectory.
We had a lot to talk about,
just catching him up on how things work around here.
Monsignor just loves him, and I can see why.
translation.ko: 몬시뇰께서 엄청 아끼시는 분인데 그 이유를 알 것 같아요

translation.en: -Leeza Scarborough! -[chuckles] How do you know my name?
translation.ko: - 리자 스카버러! - 제 이름을 어떻게 아셨어요?

translation.en: Monsignor's told me all about you.
He says I'll see you at daily mass, and that it may just be the two of us.
translation.ko: 매일 미사에서 단둘이 볼 수도 있다고 하셨지

translation.en: Father. Wade Scarborough. My wife, Dolly.
translation.ko: 신부님, 웨이드 스카버러예요 여긴 제 아내 돌리입니다

translation.en: -[Dolly] Such a pleasure to meet you. -Of course, Mr. Mayor, Mrs. Mayor.
translation.ko: - 만나서 너무 반가워요 - 물론이죠, 시장 부부님

translation.en: I am so sorry to surprise you like this.
The diocese was supposed to contact you directly.
[Wade] Please, call me Wade.
Golly, it's such a joy to see a new face.
translation.ko: 세상에, 새로운 얼굴을 보니 얼마나 반가운지 몰라요

translation.en: Welcome to the Pot, what's left of it anyway.
translation.ko: 포트에 잘 오셨어요 남은 사람이 별로 없지만요

translation.en: The Crock Pot!
[Wade] Yeah, well, it's a cute nickname, yeah.
But you know, it's true. We are a melting pot, a grab bag…
translation.ko: 사실이에요, 사람과 재료가 섞인 포트이자 종합 세트죠

translation.en: -A piñata, even. [chuckles] -Mmm.
[Dolly] A whole variety of different flavors
that just keeps getting pummeled with some huge awful stick. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 거대하고 끔찍한 막대기로 계속 후려 맞는달까요

translation.en: [Wade] We sure are glad to add you to the stew.
-[Annie] Annie Flynn, Father. -Annie Flynn.
-And this is my husband, Ed. -Ed Flynn.
translation.ko: - 이쪽은 제 남편 에드고요 - 에드 플린

translation.en: Father.
And I noticed you sat back for Communion.
That got rather quiet, didn't it?
My son Riley, he's--
Not exactly in a state of grace right now.
[Father Paul] Hey, look, I think that's great.
Uh, turns out I'm not much use to people who are in a state of grace.
translation.ko: 은총 받은 사람들에게 전 별 소용이 없더라고요

translation.en: Jesus, uh,
he didn't really have that much interest for those kind of people, either.
No, he seemed to go straight for those folks
who weren't in a state of grace.
They were his favorite people, turns out. They were the ones he called friends.
translation.ko: 알고 보니 그들을 가장 좋아하고 친구로 여겼죠

translation.en: Yeah, we can work with that.
Yeah, uh, welcome to the Crock Pot.
It was a nice surprise to hear the old translation again.
-We haven't heard that in what, ten years? -Yeah.
translation.ko: - 그 번역 안 쓴 지 10년 됐나? - 응

translation.en: Didn't know you were still doing that.
You noticed, huh? I know, the new missal is closer to the original Latin, but…
translation.ko: 눈치채셨군요? 새 미사 경본은 라틴 원어에 가까운데…

translation.en: Well, well, well.
[Erin] It's the prodigal son.
[chuckles] No, I think, uh, you're the prodigal one.
-I'm just the black sheep. -[chuckles]
Can I walk you home?
Yeah. Let's walk.
Where were you?
In New York. Upstate New York.
I guessed that.
I mean, when you ran away, it was the subject of a lot of debate.
translation.ko: 네가 도망갔을 때 다들 말이 많았어

translation.en: A lot of people had theories and most of them were Hollywood,
but that was one of my guesses.
Why?
Covered bridges.
-You remember that? -Mmm-hmm.
I told you that like half our lives ago.
I didn't start there.
I went south, then I went west.
And I was in Austin for a while. And I joined up with a rock band.
[chuckling] You're kidding.
I was such an idiot.
-Well, I guess we both were idiots. -Hmm.
Look at us, back where we started. The one place we swore we'd never end up.
translation.ko: 봐, 결국 원점으로 돌아왔어 절대 안 오겠다던 곳으로

translation.en: What about you?
Chicago.
-No rock band though. -Mmm.
Just financial stuff. Went to school, partied too much.
translation.ko: 금융 일을 했어 학교 다니고 지나치게 파티하고

translation.en: I'm shocked.
Made a lot of money. For a bit.
Stocks, then a startup. But then all…
That all went away.
-Married? -No, no. You?
Yeah. I mean, technically, it…
But it's over. It's also a long story.
Surprised to see you in church.
Yeah, me too.
I would have never guessed it, but it's been good for me.
translation.ko: 나도 성당 다닐지 절대 몰랐는데 괜찮더라고

translation.en: -I saw you sit back during Communion. -[sighs]
It's funny, most guys find Jesus in prison.
Well, you always went your own way.
Yeah, that wasn't it though.
I threw away the Bible the first night. But it…
It wasn't instant.
I did go looking. I really did.
There's a lot of time to read in there and I read it all,
translation.ko: 그 안에선 읽을 시간이 많으니까 전부 읽어 봤지

translation.en: Torah, Quran, Talmud, Tao Te Ching.
Judaism, Buddhism, Islam, Jainism.
Figured if I was lookin' for God, I should look everywhere.
translation.ko: 이왕 신을 찾을 거 전부 뒤져보려고 했지

translation.en: Came out of that an atheist.
What?
I'm supposed to be the godless heathen, and you are the altar boy.
translation.ko: 신을 안 믿는 이도교는 나고 넌 복사잖아

translation.en: My mom wouldn't believe any of this.
And you're pregnant.
Yeah, I am.
Bet that's a story.
It is and it isn't.
Littlefoot saved my life.
Is there anything else you need this afternoon, Father?
translation.ko: 오늘 오후에 더 필요한 거 있으신가요, 신부님?

translation.en: For the storm or…
Oh. No. No, thank you, Miss Keane.
Can I ask you something?
Forgive me, I don't mean to…
It's just you're wearing a gold chasuble today.
Uh, yes, I am.
Isn't that for feast days and special…
translation.ko: 축일이나 특별한 날에 입는 것 아닌가요?

translation.en: Shouldn't it be green today?
We're in Ordinary Time. It's the seventh Sunday of Ordinary Time.
No, I'm afraid I wasn't able to locate the green chasuble this morning.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침에 녹색 제의복을 못 찾아서요

translation.en: Perhaps Monsignor Pruitt,
he stored it somewhere unusual given his mental state before he left.
translation.ko: 정신적으로 불안하시니 특별한 곳에 숨기고 가셨나 봐요

translation.en: I just figured this was better than my pajamas.
Honestly, I didn't expect that anyone would notice.
Well, in the future, let me know if there's an issue.
That's what I'm here for. I can order more as well.
translation.ko: 도와드리려고 제가 있는걸요 더 주문할 수도 있고요

translation.en: I'm sure I'll find it. I just need some time to open up all the cabinets.
translation.ko: 옷장을 다 열어볼 시간만 있으면 찾을 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: Of course.
This was excellent.
Have a good afternoon, Father. I'm glad you're here.
translation.ko: 좋은 오후 보내세요, 신부님 오셔서 기뻐요

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
And likewise.
[Riley] Must be weird, I mean, living there with her gone?
translation.ko: 어머니 돌아가시고 여기 사니까 이상하지 않아?

translation.en: [Erin] It's a lot better than when she was here. You at home?
translation.ko: 계실 때보다 낫지 넌 집에서 지내?

translation.en: [Riley] Oh, yeah.
[Erin] That's gotta feel weird.
-Tiny room, twin bed. -Actually, I'm kinda used to that.
translation.ko: - 작은 방에 1인용 침대라니 - 실은 그건 좀 익숙해

translation.en: So, I mean, you came back… here.
Like, you came back here on purpose.
Why?
How are you, Riley?
Hangin' in.
No, I mean, how are you?
I don't know.
That's kinda…
That's kinda the whole thing. I don't know. I have no idea.
translation.ko: 그게 다야 모르겠다는 거, 전혀 모르겠어

translation.en: I mean, in prison, it was easy. I had things to do, you know.
translation.ko: 감방에선 쉬웠어 할 일이 있었고, 날짜를 세고 먹고, 자고, 책을 읽었지

translation.en: Count the days, count down the sentence, eat, sleep, read.
translation.ko: 할 일이 있었고, 날짜를 세고 먹고, 자고, 책을 읽었지

translation.en: It's all pretty carefully spelled out for you. Regimented. But here…
translation.ko: 모든 걸 세심하게 설명해 줬고 엄격하게 지키면 됐는데 여긴…

translation.en: Here…
I have nothing.
What, am I gonna get a job?
Go to school? I have no money, no prospects, I just…
translation.ko: 학교에 가? 돈도 없고 가능성도 없고 그냥…

translation.en: I just exist now.
That's it. I have…
absolutely no purpose at all.
I'm just sitting in my parents' house, breathing,
and serving no purpose to anyone whatsoever. I'm just…
translation.ko: 누구에게도 아무런 도움도 못 되고 그저…

translation.en: living.
And that's the worst part, because I shouldn't be alive, Erin.
translation.ko: 난 살아 있으면 안 되니까 더 최악이지, 에린

translation.en: So I don't know.
What I do here.
I eat. Sleep.
Shit, I don't know.
Walk home now, eat dinner, wait out this fuckin' storm.
translation.ko: 이제 집에 가서 저녁 먹고 좆 같은 폭풍이나 기다려야지

translation.en: There you go.
Do that.
Ride out the storm tonight, and then tomorrow…
you'll see what tomorrow's all about. Find another project.
translation.ko: 내일 뭐가 기다리는지 알게 될 거야, 또 다른 일을 찾고

translation.en: I'm sorry.
For what you've been through.
I'm really, really sorry.
[Annie] So it's just…
Just this one. Just the big one.
The little ones I can replace, but just this one.
translation.ko: 작은 건 내가 교체할 수 있으니까 이것만 대줘

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
-[Mildred] What's happening? -[Sarah] Mom, it's okay.
[Riley] I swear he's out there, just walking on the beach.
What? No, he's on the mainland.
[Riley] Okay, maybe he came back,
and he wandered out, having one of those spells.
translation.ko: 그러고 병 때문에 밖을 서성이는 거예요

translation.en: -I'm not seeing anything. -I don't see him.
No, I swear, it's the hat, the coat. I know the outfit, and it's him.
translation.ko: 아니, 그 모자랑 코트 그분 복장을 알아요, 그분이에요

translation.en: No, he's on the mainland.
It's Pruitt!
Honey, my eyes aren't what they used to be, so I can't…
translation.ko: 요즘 시력이 예전 같지 않아서 잘 안…

translation.en: [Riley] Father Pruitt!
Monsignor!
Monsignor! Monsignor!
Father!
[Annie] The phones are still down.
We should just walk to the rectory and settle this.
translation.ko: 그냥 사제관에 가서 해결하는 게 낫겠어

translation.en: Make sure he's okay.
I have to check on the boat anyway.
translation.ko: 난 어차피 배를 살피러 가야 해

translation.en: Dad. What is that?
